stories.body:
(Bloomberg) -- Nvidia Corp., the world's most valuable chipmaker, announced a raft of updates to its software offerings that aim to make it easier for a wider variety of businesses to use generative artificial intelligence.
 Most Read from Bloomberg
  Venezuela's Opposition Disputes Claim of Maduro Election Victory
  Harris' Running-Mate Search Zeroes In on Three Top Contenders
  Traders Fret as 32-Hour Central Bank Spree Hangs Over Market
  Maduro Regime Accuses Rival of Sabotage, Triggering Protests
  Tesla Analyst Nearly Crashes While Using ‘Full Self-Driving'
  The chip company officially released what it calls NIMs, or Nvidia inference micro services, which are software packages that take care of many of the logistical issues needed to use AI for a specific purpose. Generative AI, the technology behind chatbots, voice recognition and other automated human interactions with computers, often requires the orchestration of numerous pieces of hardware, software and information retrieval. Many companies don't have the expertise so Nvidia is trying to do that for them, for a fee.
  Nvidia founder and Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang showcased his company's latest offerings Monday at the Siggraph conference in Denver. He's at the graphics technology conference — the latest in a stream of appearances at public events — seeking to persuade as many industries as possible to start using his technology and make AI pervasive in the economy. Later, he is scheduled to appear on stage at the conference with Meta Platforms Inc. CEO Mark Zuckerberg.
  Nvidia's chips have become central to the surge in building new systems being deployed to support artificial intelligence computing. The company's revenue doubled last year and is on course to double again in the current fiscal year.
  The software and services are included in its Nvidia AI Enterprise product, which costs $4,500 per graphics processor used per year. The software and services are designed to work on Nvidia hardware.
  “The Nvidia NIM is a comprehensive solution for deploying generative AI simplified for developers, but built for applications at scale,” said Kari Briski, Nvidia's vice president of product management for AI and HPC software development kits.
  Nvidia had made about 100 of the inference micro services available in preview and is now releasing completed versions. For example, Getty Images Holdings' services is getting improved high-resolution image generation by making the software better at understanding text prompts. Shutterstock Inc.'s Edify three-dimensional image generator is going live with the ability to respond to text or images.
  Most AI is used by knowledge workers to help with digital tasks, according to Nvidia. To get generative AI into broader circulation, Nvidia is providing software and services that will allow, for example, users of Apple Inc.'s Vision Pro headset to create virtual worlds. So-called virtual twins will be used for tasks such as training robotic computers to act more like humans, cutting out the need for developers to do it manually, Nvidia said.
  Most Read from Bloomberg Businessweek
  ‘Dancing With Death': What It's Like to Dismantle a Ship
  The Miseducation of America's Nurse Practitioners
  Joe Rogan Invaded Austin and Became Comedy's New Kingmaker
  Disney Bets on Deadpool, Wolverine and Dirty Jokes to Save Marvel
  How Sonny Angels and Smiskis Took Over TikTok
  ©2024 Bloomberg L.P.

categories.label: Trading Impact (ICE Codes) Important Corporate Events

stories.body:
Zeekr: La nueva apuesta china en el mercado mexicano de autos eléctricos premium. La llegada de Zeekr a México representa un hito en la industria automotriz nacional. Respaldada por el gigante chino Geely, esta marca premium de vehículos eléctricos promete revolucionar el mercado con su tecnología avanzada, diseño innovador y enfoque en la experiencia del cliente.
 Zeekr: La nueva apuesta china en el mercado mexicano
  Nacida en 2021 como parte del conglomerado Geely, Zeekr hereda el ADN de marcas reconocidas como Volvo, Lotus y Mercedes-Benz. Esta combinación única le permite ofrecer vehículos eléctricos de alta gama con un nivel de calidad y sofisticación sin precedentes.
  Edgar Suárez, Country Manager de Zeekr en México, destaca que la marca fue concebida desde sus inicios como una empresa global, con la intención de conquistar mercados internacionales. En México, Zeekr inicia su andadura con los modelos 001 y X, dos vehículos que representan lo mejor de la ingeniería y el diseño automotriz.
  El Zeekr 001, con sus cinco récords Guinness, es el modelo insignia de la marca y se posiciona como un sedán deportivo eléctrico de alto rendimiento. Por otro lado, el Zeekr X es un SUV urbano que combina diseño atractivo con funcionalidad y tecnología de vanguardia.
  Zeekr se adentra en un segmento del mercado mexicano que está experimentando un crecimiento exponencial: el de los vehículos eléctricos premium. Aunque ya existen competidores consolidados como Tesla, Zeekr se diferencia por su enfoque en la tecnología, el diseño y la experiencia del cliente.
  Uno de los aspectos más destacados de la estrategia de Zeekr en México es su fuerte apuesta por la postventa. La marca cuenta con un equipo de técnicos altamente capacitados y un inventario completo de refacciones para garantizar un servicio de calidad a sus clientes. Además, se han establecido alianzas estratégicas con distribuidores locales para asegurar una amplia cobertura en todo el país.
  Con una oferta de productos innovadores, una estrategia de postventa sólida y el respaldo de un gigante automotriz como Geely, Zeekr tiene todas las herramientas para convertirse en un jugador importante en el mercado mexicano de vehículos eléctricos.

stories.title: Zeekr: La nueva apuesta china en el mercado mexicano

en.body:
Zeekr: The new Chinese investment in the Mexican market of premium electric cars. The arrival of Zeekr to Mexico represents a milestone in the national automotive industry. Backed by the Chinese giant Geely, this brand of electric vehicles promises to revolutionize the market with its advanced technology, innovative design and customer experience.
Zeekr: China’s New Stock in the Mexican Market
Born in 2021 as part of the Geely conglomerated, Zeekr inherited the DNA of brands known as Volvo, Lotus and Mercedes-Benz. This unique combination allows you to offer high-speed electric vehicles with an unprecedented level of quality and sophisticatedness.
Edgar Suárez, Country Manager of Zeekr in Mexico, highlights that the brand was designed from its inception as a global company, with the intention of winning international markets. In Mexico, Zeekr starts its turn with models 001 and X, two vehicles that represent the best of engineering and automotive design.
The Zeekr 001, with its five Guinness records, is the brand's signature model and is positioned as an electric high-performance sports sedant. On the other hand, the Zeekr X is an urban SUV that combines attractive design with functionality and advanced technology.
Zeekr is entering a segment of the Mexican market that is experiencing exponential growth: that of premium electric vehicles. Although there are already consolidated competitors such as Tesla, Zeekr differs from its approach to technology, design and customer experience.
One of the most prominent aspects of Zeekr’s strategy in Mexico is its strong post-sale bet. The brand has a highly qualified technical team and a complete inventory of translations to ensure a quality service to its customers. In addition, strategic alliances have been established with local distributors to ensure broad coverage throughout the country.
With an innovative product offer, a strong post-sale strategy and the support of a giant automobile such as Geely, Zeekr has all the tools to become an important player in the Mexican electric vehicle market.
en.title: Zeekr: China’s New Stock in the Mexican Market

stories.body:
Indian stock market: Gift Nifty was trading around 24,878 level, a discount of nearly 45 points from the Nifty futures' previous close, indicating a negative start for the Indian stock market indices.
 Indian stock market: The domestic equity benchmark indices, Sensex and Nifty 50, are expected to open lower on Tuesday following weak sentiment in global markets.
  Asian markets traded lower, while US stock market indices ended mostly lower overnight ahead of the monetary policy decisions by various global central banks, including the US Federal Reserve and Bank of Japan.
  The Bank of Japan began its policy meeting, while the US Fed's Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting will also begin today with the interest rate decision to be announced on July 31.
  On Monday, the Indian stock market benchmark indices gave up day's gains to end flat, with the Nifty 50 just shy of touching the 25,000-mark during the session.
  The Sensex inched 23.12 points, or 0.03%, higher to close at 81,355.84, while the Nifty 50 settled up 1.25 point, or 0.01%, at 24,836.10.
  “Nifty was just a kiss away from the 25,000 mark. Once the index crosses the psychological level, we believe sentiments will get a further boost. Overall, we expect the market to continue its gradual uptick, however, volatility cannot be ruled out ahead of key events,” said Siddhartha Khemka, Head - Retail Research, Motilal Oswal Financial Services Ltd.
  Here are key global market cues for Sensex today:
  Asian Markets
  Asian markets traded lower on Tuesday following a mixed trend overnight on Wall Street and as Bank of Japan begins its two-day monetary policy meeting.
  Japan's Nikkei 225 declined 0.57%, while the Topix fell 0.56%. South Korea's Kospi dropped 0.73%, and the Kosdaq fell 0.4%. Hong Kong Hang Seng index futures indicated a lower opening.
  Gift Nifty Today
  Gift Nifty was trading around 24,878 level, a discount of nearly 45 points from the Nifty futures' previous close, indicating a negative start for the Indian stock market indices.
  Wall Street
  US stock market ended Monday's choppy session mixed.
  The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 49.41 points, or 0.12%, to 40,539.93, while the S&P 500 rose 4.44 points, or 0.08%, to 5,463.54. The Nasdaq Composite closed 12.32 points, or 0.07%, higher at 17,370.20.
  Tesla share price jumped 5.6%, McDonald's stock price gained 3.7%, while Abbott Laboratories shares fell 0.4%. Coinbase Global shares declined over 3% while Riot Platforms and Marathon Digital plunged more than 5%.
  Japan Unemployment
  Conditions in Japan's labor market stayed tight in June, as the unemployment rate slipped to 2.5% in June from 2.6% a month earlier. Economists had expected the reading to hold steady at 2.6%.
  Oil Prices
  Crude oil prices traded near a seven-week low amid a shaky demand outlook, especially in China.
  Brent crude futures fell 0.20% to $79.62 per barrel, while US West Texas Intermediate (WTI) crude futures declined 0.22% to $75.64 a barrel.
  Dollar
  US dollar held steady ahead of policy decisions by the Federal Reserve, and other global central banks this week. The dollar index, which measures the currency against the euro, yen and four other major currencies, rose 0.18% to 104.56.
  (With inputs from Agencies)
  Disclaimer: The views and recommendations made above are those of individual analysts or broking companies, and not of Mint. We advise investors to check with certified experts before making any investment decisions.
  The global box office collection of Raayan, a Tamil action drama starring Dhanush, in the three days since its release, including ₹15.25 crore in the overseas market.
  The projected size of the central government debt for FY2025, up from ₹93.26 trillion in FY2019, according to India's minister of state for finance.

Gift Nifty was trading around 24,878 level, a discount of nearly 45 points from the Nifty futures' previous close, indicating a negative start for the Indian stock market indices.

On Monday, the Indian stock market benchmark indices gave up day's gains to end flat, with the Nifty 50 just shy of touching the 25,000-mark during the session.

stories.title: Indian stock market: 6 key things that changed for market overnight - Gift Nifty, US dollar to oil prices

stories.body:
1 minuto ago  LONG BEACH, California (KABC) — Meno di due settimane dopo aver annunciato che SpaceX avrebbe lasciato la California, Elon Musk ha deciso di spostare alcune operazioni dalla costa della Florida a Long Beach.
 Il porto di Long Beach sarà la nuova casa della nave di recupero Dragon di SpaceX.
  “Sono entusiasta di condividere un aggiornamento su Space Beach! Long Beach sarà la nuova casa per il veicolo di recupero Dragon di SpaceX, dove la squadra di recupero della West Coast con sede nel porto di Long Beach accoglierà sia l'agenzia che la NASA e altri privati.” astronauti che ritornano sulla Terra dall'orbita e oltre.”
  La società afferma che questa mossa mira a ridurre i rischi associati al rientro dei detriti dal veicolo spaziale.
  Il 16 luglio, Musk ha detto che avrebbe spostato la sede dell'azienda da Hawthorne al Texas per protestare contro una nuova legge in California che impedisce alle scuole di notificare ai genitori il cambiamento dell'identità di genere di uno studente.
  Ha descritto la legge come “l'ultima goccia”.
  “Ho chiarito al governatore Newsom quasi un anno fa che leggi di questo tipo avrebbero costretto le famiglie e le imprese a lasciare la California per proteggere i propri figli”, ha scritto Musk.
  Tesla, di cui Musk ricopre il ruolo di CEO, trasferirà la sua sede ad Austin da Palo Alto, in California, nel 2021.
  Musk ha anche detto di aver trasferito la sua residenza dalla California al Texas, dove non esiste alcuna imposta statale sul reddito personale.
  Di più Cosa potrebbe significare per la California il piano di Musk di spostare SpaceX in Texas?
  Martedì Elon Musk ha annunciato i suoi piani per spostare la sede di X e SpaceX in Texas. Ecco cosa potrebbe significare per la California.
  Tutti i diritti riservati a KABC Television, LLC © 2024.
  Lascia un commento

sentences: 1 minuto ago  LONG BEACH, California (KABC) — Meno di due settimane dopo aver annunciato che SpaceX avrebbe lasciato la California, Elon Musk ha deciso di spostare alcune operazioni dalla costa della Florida a Long Beach.

Il 16 luglio, Musk ha detto che avrebbe spostato la sede dell'azienda da Hawthorne al Texas per protestare contro una nuova legge in California che impedisce alle scuole di notificare ai genitori il cambiamento dell'identità di genere di uno studente.
Di più Cosa potrebbe significare per la California il piano di Musk di spostare SpaceX in Texas?
Tesla, di cui Musk ricopre il ruolo di CEO, trasferirà la sua sede ad Austin da Palo Alto, in California, nel 2021.
Musk ha anche detto di aver trasferito la sua residenza dalla California al Texas, dove non esiste alcuna imposta statale sul reddito personale.

stories.title: SpaceX lascerà la California? non esattamente. La compagnia di Elon Musk sposta la navicella spaziale Dragon in atterraggio a Long Beach dalla Florida

en.body:
1 minute acc. 1 minute LONG BEACH, California (KABC) — Less than two weeks after announcing that SpaceX would leave California, Elon Musk decided to move some operations from the coast of Florida to Long Beach.
Long Beach is the new home of the SpaceX's Dragon Retrieving.
"I am excited to share an update on Space Beach! Long Beach will be the new home for the SpaceX Dragon Recovery Vehicle, where the West Coast recovery team will host both the agency and NASA and other privates.” astronauts returning to Earth from orbit and beyond."
The company says that this move aims to reduce the risks associated with the return of waste from space vehicles.
On July 16, Musk said he would move the company's headquarters from Hawthorne to Texas to protest against a new law in California that prevents schools from informing parents of the change in the gender identity of a student.
He described the law as ‘the last drop’.
“I made it clear to Governor Newsome almost a year ago that laws of this kind would have forced families and businesses to leave California to protect their children,” Musk wrote.
Tesla, whose role as CEO, will transfer his seat to Austin from Palo Alto, California, in 2021.
Musk also said that he had moved his residence from California to Texas, where there is no state tax on personal income.
What more could California mean for the Musk plan to move SpaceX to Texas?
On Tuesday Elon Musk announced plans to move the X and SpaceX site to Texas. That's what California could mean.
All rights reserved for KABC Television, LLC © 2024.
Leave a comment
en.title: Will SpaceX leave California? Not exactly. Elon Musk's company moves the Dragon Spaceship on land to Long Beach, Florida

stories.body:
Venezuela 'Adiós, dictador Maduro': Elon Musk celebra derribo de estatua de Hugo Chávez en Venezuela en inicio de protestas El magnate dueño de X retuiteó y posteó varias publicaciones.
En una expresó: 'El burro sabe más que Maduro'. Camila Paola Sánchez Fajardo Desde que se conocieron los resultados divulgados por el Consejo Nacional Electoral (CNE), que dieron como ganador a Nicolás Maduro, el magnate y dueño de X, Elon Musk, retuiteó y posteó varias publicaciones relacionadas en las últimas horas con respecto a su reelección. El domingo 28 de julio, a la medianoche, se conoció el primer boletín, después de horas de cerrarse las urnas, que dio como ganador a Nicolás Maduro con el 51, 21 por ciento de votos. A diferencia del opositor Edmundo González Urrutia, quien quedó con el 44, 2 por ciento. Algunas figuras internacionales, como Elon Musk, se pronunciaron y calificaron las elecciones de "fraude". Desde tempranas horas, el CEO de Tesla compartió diferentes trinos en X. Incluso, mostró su apoyo por el pueblo venezolano y dejó clara su postura en contra de los resultados. 'Adiós, dictador Maduro': Elon Musk celebra derribo de estatua de Hugo Chávez De acuerdo con fotos y videos, varios ciudadanos se manifiestan por lo ocurrido. En dichas protestas, hay una en la que, parece, que un grupo de personas derribaron la estatua de Hugo Chávez. Ante esta situación, Elon Musk volvió a usar sus redes y posteó el video de la escena con la descripción: "Adiós, dictador Maduro". Adicionalmente, dejó otro que decía': "El burro sabe más que maduro". Elon Musk estalla en X contra los resultados de elecciones en Venezuela y lo calificó de fraude Sobre las 9: 30 a.m., Elon Musk estalló en su red social y escribió: "Gran fraude electoral por parte de Maduro". Mientras dejó de fondo otro trino con los porcentajes. Otros pronunciamientos y posteos del magnate Por ejemplo, compartió las cifras de una encuesta que divulgó el sitio 'End Wokennes'. Allí escribió: "Qué travesía". Además, tiempo después reposteó un trino del presidente de Argentina, Javier Milei, quien escribió en una de las partes: "Argentina no va a reconocer otro fraude, y espera que las Fuerzas Armadas esta vez defiendan la democracia y la voluntad popular". Igualmente, retuiteó una publicación que exponía la revelación de los datos del recuento de votos, de acuerdo con la línea de su actividad en X. "El Consejo Nacional Electoral de Venezuela ha detenido la transmisión de los datos del recuento de votos y está impidiendo que los testigos de los partidos de oposición accedan a las actas de votación, sacándolos de los lugares de votación.", se lee. Más noticias en EL TIEMPO Camila Paola Sánchez Fajardo dfcsd

sentences: Venezuela 'Adiós, dictador Maduro': Elon Musk celebra derribo de estatua de Hugo Chávez en Venezuela en inicio de protestas El magnate dueño de X retuiteó y posteó varias publicaciones.

Camila Paola Sánchez Fajardo Desde que se conocieron los resultados divulgados por el Consejo Nacional Electoral (CNE), que dieron como ganador a Nicolás Maduro, el magnate y dueño de X, Elon Musk, retuiteó y posteó varias publicaciones relacionadas en las últimas horas con respecto a su reelección.
'Adiós, dictador Maduro': Elon Musk celebra derribo de estatua de Hugo Chávez De acuerdo con fotos y videos, varios ciudadanos se manifiestan por lo ocurrido.
Ante esta situación, Elon Musk volvió a usar sus redes y posteó el video de la escena con la descripción: "Adiós, dictador Maduro".
Elon Musk estalló en su red social y escribió: "Gran fraude electoral por parte de Maduro".

stories.title: 'Adiós, dictador Maduro': Elon Musk celebra derribo de estatua de Hugo Chávez en Venezuela en inicio de protestas

en.body:
Venezuela 'Adiós, dictator Maduro': Elon Musk celebrates the fall of Hugo Chávez's statue in Venezuela at the beginning of protests The X-owned magnet retweeted and posted several publications.
In one statement he said: 'The cow knows more than Maduro'. Camila Paola Sánchez Fajardo Since the results of the National Electoral Council (CNE), which gave Nicholas Maduro, the X-owner and magnetist Elon Musk, have retweeted and posted several publications in recent hours regarding his re-election. On Sunday, 28 July, at midnight, the first newsletter was met after hours of closing the ballot, which gave Nicolas Maduro a winner with 51.21 percent of the vote. Unlike oppositionist Edmundo González Urrutia, who stayed with 44.2 percent. Some international figures, such as Elon Musk, spoke out and described the elections as "fraud". For hours, Tesla CEO shared different trends in X. He even showed his support for the Venezuelan people and made his position clear against the results. 'Adiós, dictator Maduro': Elon Musk celebrates the fall of Hugo Chávez's statue according to photos and videos, several citizens are demonstrating for what happened. In these protests, there is one in which it seems that a group of people have broken down Hugo Chávez's statue. In the face of this situation, Elon Musk again used his networks and posted the video of the scene with the description: "Adiós, dictator Maduro". He left another person who said, "The cow knows more than mature." Elon Musk broke down in X against the results of the elections in Venezuela and described him as fraud on 9:30 a.m., Elon Musk broke into his social network and wrote, "Grun electoral fraud by Maduro". While he left the bottom of another triangle with the percentages. Other statements and posts from the magnet, for example, shared the figures from a survey that published the site 'End Wokennes'. He wrote, "What a journey." In addition, he later posted a trilogy from Argentina’s president, Javier Milele, who wrote on one of the parties: “Argentina will not recognize another fraud, and hopes that the Armed Forces will defend democracy and popular will this time.” He also retweeted an publication that revealed the disclosure of the voting count data, according to the line of his activity in X. "The Venezuelan National Election Council has suspended the transmission of the voting count data and is preventing witnesses from the opposition parties from accessing the voting records, taking them out of voting places," it reads. More news at EL TEMPO Camila Paola Sánchez Fajardo dcsd
en.title: 'Adiós, dictator Maduro': Elon Musk celebrates the fall of Hugo Chávez's statue in Venezuela at the beginning of protests

stories.body:
MoneyDJ新聞 2024-07-30 09:01:21 記者 劉莞青 報導 晶碩(6491)第二季營運成績昨(29)日已經公告，單季EPS 6.08元，低於前一季表現，法人表示主要係因中國618旺季需求疲弱所致，且中國代工同業競爭加劇，雖然晶碩上半年中國業績仍然優於去年同期，法人仍修正晶碩今年中國營收成長幅度至低雙位數，但法人也看好，晶碩第三季開始有望逐步對日本客戶出貨矽水膠產品、晶碩矽水膠市場可從歐洲擴大到歐洲、日本兩地，預期再對晶碩產品組合帶來正向效益。
晶碩第二季營運成績均有優於去年同期表現，但較第一季表現則較為疲弱，單季營收為16.38億元、季減5%，單季毛利率約為58%、略優於前季，單季營益率為33%、則較前季減少約1個百分點，單季稅後淨利約為4.75億元、季減7%，EPS約6.08元。
 (圖片來源:晶碩官網)

stories.body:
The police department will have 10 Tesla Model Ys as patrol vehicles and 10 Tesla Model 3s for detective and administrative duties, both customized for police use.
 A city in Southern California has become the first in the nation to replace its police patrol cars with electric vehicles, officials announced Monday, unveiling a fleet of 20 new Teslas.
  South Pasadena on the edge of Los Angeles will replace its gas-guzzling police cruisers with the Teslas to help protect public health and fight climate change through reducing emissions. The Teslas will use new electric vehicle chargers installed at City Hall, officials said.
  STAY IN THE KNOW
  Watch NBC10 Boston news for free, 24/7, wherever you are.
  Get Boston local news, weather forecasts, lifestyle and entertainment stories to your inbox. Sign up for NBC Boston's newsletters
  Police vehicles typically idle more than other vehicles when officers make traffic stops or respond to emergency calls, which greatly adds to emissions, said Michael Cacciotti, a city councilmember and regional air quality official.
  “This is important, particularly in the Los Angeles area, which still has the most unhealthful air in the nation,” Cacciotti said. “We hope other police departments in the region and state will make the switch, too.”
  Other cities have some electric vehicles in their fleets but this is the first to entirely go electric, officials said. The police department in nearby Anaheim introduced six Teslas to its patrol fleet through a pilot program earlier this year
  South Pasadena Police Sgt. Tony Abdalla said in an email they were tracking about 35 other agencies across the U.S. who were willing to share their experiences with incorporating one or more Teslas into their respective fleets.
  The police department will have 10 Tesla Model Ys as patrol vehicles and 10 Tesla Model 3s for detective and administrative duties, both customized for police use. The city's net cost is $1.85 million, with more than half the total cost covered by energy providers Southern California Edison, the Clean Power Alliance, and the Mobile Source Air Pollution Reduction Review Committee.
  “We will have a 21st Century police force that is safe, clean and saves taxpayer dollars,” South Pasadena Mayor Evelyn Zneimer stated in a news release.
  The switch to electric is expected to save South Pasadena about $4,000 annually per vehicle on energy costs, and generate savings on maintenance such as brakes, oil changes and air filters, the news release said. The overall operational cost per mile will be at least half of what it was previously with gas-powered vehicles, according to Police Chief Brian Solinsky.
  The Los Angeles-Long Beach ranked no. 1 worst in the country for ozone pollution — also known as smog — and no. 6 for annual particle pollution, according to the American Lung Association. Carbon dioxide emissions also contribute to climate change, which is blamed in part for increasingly deadly wildfires in the region.
  California's Advanced Clean Fleets rule requires public agencies to ensure 50% of their vehicle purchases are zero-emissions beginning this year and 100% by 2027, but it exempts police cars and other emergency vehicles.

surface_forms.text: Mobile Source Air Pollution Reduction Review Committee

A city in Southern California has become the first in the nation to replace its police patrol cars with electric vehicles, officials announced Monday, unveiling a fleet of 20 new Teslas.
South Pasadena on the edge of Los Angeles will replace its gas-guzzling police cruisers with the Teslas to help protect public health and fight climate change through reducing emissions.

The switch to electric is expected to save South Pasadena about $4,000 annually per vehicle on energy costs, and generate savings on maintenance such as brakes, oil changes and air filters, the news release said.

stories.body:
Consolidate Pending US Fed Policy Guidance  Bursa Malaysia shares rose on Monday, matching regional gains after a closely watched key US
inflation data showed easing inflation, raising the odds for interest rate cuts ahead. The FBM KLCI climbed 11.68 points to close at 1,624.56, off an early low of 1,616.35 and high of 1,625.55, as gainers led losers 626 to 455 on total turnover of 4.23bn shares worth RM2.89bn.
  Supports at 1,615/1,607; Resistance at 1,638/1,640
  Stocks should consolidate at current levels as investors await earnings from key US technology names and upcoming monetary policy guidance from the US Federal Reserve. Immediate index supports will be at 1,615, 1,607 and 1,583, the respective 30-day, 50-day and 100-day moving average levels, while immediate resistance will be the recent high of 1,638, with 1,640 and 1,660 as tougher upside hurdles.
  Bargain Gamuda & Sunway Construction
  Gamuda should attract buyers on weakness for rebound upside, with a confirmed breakout above the 161.8%FP (RM8.19) to aim for the 176.4%FP (RM8.54) and 200%FP (RM9.10) ahead, and key uptrend supports from the rising 30-day ma (RM7.31) and 50-day ma (RM6.80). SunCon will need convincing breakout above the 150%FP (RM5.19) to target the 161.8%FP (RM5.46) and 176.4%FP (RM5.80) going forward, with uptrend supports from the 30-day ma (RM4.37) and 50-day ma (RM3.94) cushioning downside.
  Asian Markets Rebound on Rate-Cut Optimism
  Stocks in Asia rebounded on Monday after a key U.S. inflation report late last Friday raised hopes for an interest rate cut. The inflation report showed personal income rose by less than expected, while personal spending increased in line with economist estimates. Another report also showed that consumer sentiment in the U.S. deteriorated less than previously estimated in July. The Fed is likely to signal its plans to cut in September at the conclusion of its meeting on Wednesday, according to economists surveyed by Bloomberg News, a move they say will kick off reductions each quarter through 2025. Money markets are fully pricing a September move, with a chance of two more by year-end, according to swaps data compiled by Bloomberg. A raft of earnings including Apple Inc., Amazon.com Inc and Microsoft Corp. will also be parsed for clues about the health of the world's largest economy.
  Elsewhere in Asia, Chinese factory activity data is due this week, providing further insight into a surprise People's Bank of China rate cut to boost a flailing economy. Australian inflation data will also be keenly awaited as traders' debate whether the nation's central bank will hike its key rate as early as next week. Japan's Nikkei 225 jumped 2.13% to finish at 38,468.63, while the broad-based Topix added 2.23% to 2,759.67. Australia's S&P/ASX 200 gained 0.86% to 7,989.60 and South Korea's Kospi rose 1.30% to 2.767.53. Hong Kong Hang Seng index also gained 1.28% to finish at 17,238.34, while the Shanghai Composite added 0.03% to 2,891.85.
  Wall Street Subdued Ahead of Big Tech Earnings
  Wall Street's main indexes were mostly flat in choppy trading overnight as traders awaited high-profile corporate results and the Federal Reserve's monetary policy meeting this week. The Dow Jones Industrial Average lost 0.12% to end at 40,539.93. The S&P 500 inched up by 0.08% to 5,463.54 and the Nasdaq Composite added 0.07% to 17,370.20. The choppy trading on Wall Street comes as traders seem reluctant to make significant moves ahead of the big tech earnings and Federal Reserve's monetary policy meeting this week. This week's earnings slate will play a role in determining whether tech stocks can now bounce back from last week's declines. Another key event this week will be the Federal Reserve meeting, with the central bank set to release a new policy statement on Wednesday.
  The Fed is not expected to cut interest rates this week, but traders will be looking for clues as to how likely the central bank is to make a move at its September meeting. On Friday investors will focus on the July non-farm payrolls report for signs of possible weakening in the labor market. Among the S&P 500's 11 major industry sector indexes consumer discretionary was boosted by Tesla as the electric vehicle maker's stock rallied after Morgan Stanley named the electric vehicle stock a top pick. On Semiconductor advanced 11.5% after reporting better-than-expected earnings and revenue.
  Source: TA Research - 30 Jul 2024

The choppy trading on Wall Street comes as traders seem reluctant to make significant moves ahead of the big tech earnings and Federal Reserve's monetary policy meeting this week.

The Fed is not expected to cut interest rates this week, but traders will be looking for clues as to how likely the central bank is to make a move at its September meeting.
